scripts.setup: bun install && bun run --cwd portal install && bun run --cwd packages/schema install && bun run --cwd docs install
scripts.build: bun run build:portal && bun run build:schema && bun run build:docs
scripts.dev: echo 'Run dev servers individually: bun run dev:portal, dev:schema, or dev:docs'
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local --config packages/schema/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.db:migrate:remote: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config packages/schema/wrangler.jsonc
scripts.deploy: bun run deploy:portal && bun run deploy:schema && bun run deploy:docs
